member.name: T:Rebex.Net.Daytime
member.summary: Provides methods for communication with DAYTIME servers (RFC 867).

member.name: T:Rebex.Net.TimeBase
member.summary: Base class for TIME, DAYTIME and NTP/SNTP clients.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.TimeBase.GetTime
member.summary: Sends a request for time to the TIME server passed to the constructor and waits for the answer that contains the time value.
member.returns: The server's response.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.TimeBase.GetTimeAsync(System.Object)
member.summary: Begins asynchronous GetTime operation. Sends a request for time to the TIME server passed to the constructor and waits for the answer that contains the time value.
member.param: An optional user-provided object that identifies this particular asynchronous operation.
member.returns: The server's response.

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.TimeBase.Timeout
member.summary: Gets or sets the length of time before the operation times out (specify -1 or 0 to indicate that the request does not time out).
member.value: The length of time, in milliseconds, until the operation times out, or the value -1 or 0 to indicate that the request does not time out. Default is 60000 (60 seconds).

remarks.p: The internal timeout counter is reset every time data is sent or received from to server. This also means that data transfers only time out after x milliseconds of inactivity, not after x milliseconds from the start of the transfer.
Minimal value is 1000. Setting this to a value lower than 1000 will set it to 1000.

member.name: F:Rebex.Net.Daytime.DefaultPort
member.summary: Default DAYTIME port number (13).

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.Daytime.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Creates an instance of class and binds it to the specified DAYTIME server.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.Daytime.#ctor(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Creates an instance of class and binds it to the specified DAYTIME server.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.Daytime.Parse(System.String)
member.summary: Parses the specified DAYTIME result.
member.returns: Timestamp corresponding to the specified daytime value.

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.Daytime.UseTcp
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to use the TCP protocol (default is UDP).
member.value: True to use TCP; false to use UDP. Default is false.

member.name: T:Rebex.Net.Ntp
member.summary: Provides methods for communication with NTP servers. Supported protocol versions are 3 and 4.

member.name: F:Rebex.Net.Ntp.DefaultPort
member.summary: Default NTP port number (123).

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.Ntp.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Creates an instance of class and binds it to the specified NTP time server.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.Ntp.#ctor(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Creates an instance of class and binds it to the specified NTP time server.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.Ntp.GetTime
member.summary: Sends a request for time to the NTP server passed to the constructor and waits for the answer that contains the time values to calculate the offset between the local and server time.
member.returns: The server's response. Use its to determine the time offset.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.Ntp.GetTimeAsync(System.Object)
member.summary: Begins asynchronous GetTime operation. Sends a request for time to the NTP server passed to the constructor and waits for the answer that contains the time values to calculate the offset between the local and server time.
member.param: An optional user-provided object that identifies this particular asynchronous operation.
member.returns: The server's response. Use its to determine the time offset.

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.Ntp.VersionNumber
member.summary: NTP/SNTP protocol version number.

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.Ntp.SkipStratumCheck
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the stratum value returned by the server is checked for a value indicating a Kiss-of-Death (error) packet (default is to perform check).
member.value: True to skip stratum check; false to not skip the check. Default is false.

member.name: T:Rebex.Net.NtpException
member.summary: Represents an NTP/SNTP error.

member.name: T:Rebex.Net.TimeException
member.summary: Represents a TIME, DAYTIME or NTP/SNTP error.

member.name: T:Rebex.Net.NtpMode
member.summary: NTP modes (non-reserved only) used by .

member.name: F:Rebex.Net.NtpMode.SymmetricActive
member.summary: Symmetric active NTP server mode. This component never operates in this mode - it is included for completeness only.

member.name: F:Rebex.Net.NtpMode.SymmetricPassive
member.summary: Symmetric passive NTP server mode. This component never operates in this mode - it is included for completeness only.

member.name: F:Rebex.Net.NtpMode.Client
member.summary: NTP/SNTP client mode. NTP packets sent by this component have this mode.

member.name: F:Rebex.Net.NtpMode.Server
member.summary: NTP/SNTP server mode. NTP packets received by this component have this mode.

member.name: F:Rebex.Net.NtpMode.Broadcast
member.summary: Broadcast mode. This component never operates in this mode - it is included for completeness only.

member.name: T:Rebex.Net.NtpLeapIndicator
member.summary: NTP leap second indicator used by .

member.name: F:Rebex.Net.NtpLeapIndicator.NoLeap
member.summary: No leap second in the last minute.

member.name: F:Rebex.Net.NtpLeapIndicator.OneSecondMore
member.summary: The last minute has 61 seconds.

member.name: F:Rebex.Net.NtpLeapIndicator.OneSecondLess
member.summary: The last minute has 59 seconds.

member.name: F:Rebex.Net.NtpLeapIndicator.AlarmCondition
member.summary: Alarm condition (clock not synchronized).

member.name: T:Rebex.Net.NtpPacket
member.summary: Represents a NTP packet.
member.remarks: See RFC 1305 for the packet specification. Note that this implementation does not use any optional fields.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.NtpPacket.GetRootDelay
member.summary: Root Delay.
member.value: 4 bytes - see RFC 2030 for their interpretation.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.NtpPacket.GetRootDispersion
member.summary: Root Dispersion.
member.value: 4 bytes - see RFC 2030 for their interpretation.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.NtpPacket.GetReferenceIdentifier
member.summary: Reference Identifier.
member.value: 4 bytes - see RFC 2030 for their interpretation.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.NtpPacket.ToArray
member.summary: Accessor for the raw packet data.

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.NtpPacket.LeapIndicator
member.summary: Returns the leap second indicator.

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.NtpPacket.VersionNumber
member.summary: NTP/SNTP protocol version number.

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.NtpPacket.Mode
member.summary: NTP packet mode.
member.value: 3 bits. Possible values are described in .

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.NtpPacket.Stratum
member.summary: Stratum level (time quality) of the packet originator's clock.
member.value: 0 is unspecified or undefined, 1 primary (for Internet NTP servers that generally means an atomic clock, within Windows local networks it's the best time source in the network), higher numbers mean increasing distance from the primary source.

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.NtpPacket.Poll
member.summary: Poll Interval, in seconds to the nearest power of two.
member.value: Maximum range is 4 to 14, normal range 6 to 10.

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.NtpPacket.Precision
member.summary: Precision of the packet originator's clock, in seconds to the nearest power of two.

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.NtpPacket.ReferenceTimestamp
member.summary: Reference Timestamp: the time at which the local clock was last set or corrected.

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.NtpPacket.OriginateTimestamp
member.summary: Originate Timestamp: the time at which the request departed the client for the server.

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.NtpPacket.ReceiveTimestamp
member.summary: Receive Timestamp: the time at which the request arrived at the server.

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.NtpPacket.TransmitTimestamp
member.summary: Transmit Timestamp: the time at which the reply departed the server for the client.

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.NtpPacket.DestinationTimestamp
member.summary: Destination Timestamp: the time at which the reply arrived at the client.

member.name: T:Rebex.Net.NtpResponse
member.summary: Represents a NTP response.

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.NtpResponse.Packet
member.summary: Gets the NTP packet with additional information. For advanced users only.

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.NtpResponse.Stratum
member.summary: Stratum level (time quality) of the packet originator's clock.
member.value: 0 is unspecified or undefined, 1 primary (for Internet NTP servers that generally means an atomic clock, within Windows local networks it is the best time source in the network), higher numbers mean increasing distance from the primary source.

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.NtpResponse.TimeOffset
member.summary: Gets the difference between the server time and time on the local machine.
member.returns: The time difference which should be added to system time to get the corrected time.

member.name: T:Rebex.Net.NtpTimestamp
member.summary: NTP timestamp implementation for . This is a value type.
member.remarks: See RFC 1305 for the definition of the timestamp format.

member.name: F:Rebex.Net.NtpTimestamp.MinValue
member.summary: Represents the smallest possible value of NtpTimestamp.

member.name: F:Rebex.Net.NtpTimestamp.MaxValue
member.summary: Represents the largest possible value of NtpTimestamp.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.NtpTimestamp.#ctor(System.DateTime)
member.summary: Constructs the timestamp from .NET time.
member.param: The local time. Allowed range is 1968-01-20 3:14:08 to 2104-02-26 9:42:23.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.NtpTimestamp.#ctor(System.Byte[],System.Int32)
member.summary: Constructs the timestamp from the raw NTP format.
member.param: The starting position of the timestamp in the buffer.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.NtpTimestamp.CompareTo(System.Object)
member.summary: Compares this instance to a specified object and returns an indication of their relative values.
member.param: An object to compare, or null.
member.returns: A 32-bit signed integer that indicates the relative order of the objects being compared. See for details.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.NtpTimestamp.Equals(System.Object)
member.summary: Indicates whether the specified object is equal to the current object.
member.param: An object to compare with this instance.
member.returns: true if obj is a NtpTimestamp that represents the same time as this instance; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.NtpTimestamp.GetHashCode
member.summary: Returns a hash code for this instance.
member.returns: The 32 least significant bits of the timestamp.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.NtpTimestamp.ToArray
member.summary: Accessor for the timestamp in NTP format.
member.value: The 8-byte timestamp. Note that the array is not writeable - that is, it is possible to write into it, but that won't change the value of the NtpTimestamp instance.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.NtpTimestamp.op_Equality(Rebex.Net.NtpTimestamp,Rebex.Net.NtpTimestamp)
member.summary: Compare two instances of NtpTimestamp.
member.returns: True if equal; false if not equal.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.NtpTimestamp.op_Inequality(Rebex.Net.NtpTimestamp,Rebex.Net.NtpTimestamp)
member.summary: Compare two instances of NtpTimestamp.
member.returns: Flase if equal; true if not equal.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.NtpTimestamp.op_LessThan(Rebex.Net.NtpTimestamp,Rebex.Net.NtpTimestamp)
member.summary: Indicates whether a specified NtpTimestamp is less than another specified NtpTimestamp.
member.returns: true if the value of a is less than the value of b; otherwise false.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.NtpTimestamp.op_GreaterThan(Rebex.Net.NtpTimestamp,Rebex.Net.NtpTimestamp)
member.summary: Indicates whether a specified NtpTimestamp is greater than another specified NtpTimestamp.
member.returns: true if the value of a is greater than the value of b; otherwise false.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.NtpTimestamp.op_LessThanOrEqual(Rebex.Net.NtpTimestamp,Rebex.Net.NtpTimestamp)
member.summary: Indicates whether a specified NtpTimestamp is less than or equal to another specified NtpTimestamp.
member.returns: true if the value of a is less than or equal to the value of b; otherwise false.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.NtpTimestamp.op_GreaterThanOrEqual(Rebex.Net.NtpTimestamp,Rebex.Net.NtpTimestamp)
member.summary: Indicates whether a specified NtpTimestamp is greater than or equal to another specified NtpTimestamp.
member.returns: true if the value of a is greater than or equal to the value of b; otherwise false.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.NtpTimestamp.op_Addition(Rebex.Net.NtpTimestamp,Rebex.Net.NtpTimestampDifference)
member.summary: Adds a time difference to a timestamp.
member.returns: A timestamp plus a time difference.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.NtpTimestamp.op_Subtraction(Rebex.Net.NtpTimestamp,Rebex.Net.NtpTimestampDifference)
member.summary: Subtracts a time difference from a timestamp.
member.returns: A timestamp minus a time difference.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.NtpTimestamp.op_Subtraction(Rebex.Net.NtpTimestamp,Rebex.Net.NtpTimestamp)
member.summary: Subtracts a timestamp from a timestamp, calculating the time difference between the timestamps.
member.returns: A time difference (positive or negative).

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.NtpTimestamp.Add(Rebex.Net.NtpTimestampDifference)
member.summary: Adds the specified time difference to this instance.
member.returns: A timestamp plus a time difference.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.NtpTimestamp.Subtract(Rebex.Net.NtpTimestampDifference)
member.summary: Subtracts the specified time difference from this instance.
member.returns: A timestamp plus a time difference.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.NtpTimestamp.Subtract(Rebex.Net.NtpTimestamp)
member.summary: Subtracts the specified timestamp from this instance, calculating the time difference between the two timestamps.
member.returns: A time difference (positive or negative).

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.NtpTimestamp.ToString
member.summary: Converts the value of this instance to string representation (analogically to DateTime.ToString).
member.returns: String representation of UTC time.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.NtpTimestamp.ToLocalTime
member.summary: Accessor for the timestamp in .NET time format. Converts to local time.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.NtpTimestamp.ToUniversalTime
member.summary: Accessor for the timestamp in .NET time format.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.NtpTimestamp.ToUnixTime
member.summary: Accessor for the timestamp in Unix time format.
member.value: The number of the whole seconds of the timestamp, counted from Unix Epoch (00:00:00 UTC, January 1, 1970).

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.NtpTimestamp.Now
member.summary: Gets the current system time.
member.remarks: The precision of is higher than the precision of . As recommended by RFC 1305, the low-order bits of the new timestamp which cannot be initialized from DateTime are randomized.

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.NtpTimestamp.IsValid
member.summary: Minimal validity check according to RFC 1305.

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.NtpTimestamp.Microsecond
member.summary: The sub-second part of the timestamp, on microsecond scale.

member.name: T:Rebex.Net.NtpTimestampDifference
member.summary: The difference between two values. This is a value type.

member.name: F:Rebex.Net.NtpTimestampDifference.MinValue
member.summary: Represents the smallest possible value of NtpTimestampDifference.

member.name: F:Rebex.Net.NtpTimestampDifference.MaxValue
member.summary: Represents the largest possible value of NtpTimestampDifference.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.NtpTimestampDifference.CompareTo(System.Object)
member.summary: Compares this instance to a specified object and returns an indication of their relative values.
member.param: An object to compare, or null.
member.returns: A 32-bit signed integer that indicates the relative order of the objects being compared. See for details.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.NtpTimestampDifference.Equals(System.Object)
member.summary: Indicates whether the specified object is equal to the current object.
member.param: An object to compare with this instance.
member.returns: true if value is a NtpTimestampDifference that represents the same time difference as this instance; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.NtpTimestampDifference.GetHashCode
member.summary: Returns a hash code for this instance.
member.returns: The 32 least significant bits of the time difference.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.NtpTimestampDifference.ToTimeSpan
member.summary: Gets the instance that represents the time difference.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.NtpTimestampDifference.ToString
member.summary: Converts the value of this instance to its string representation.
member.returns: String representation of time difference.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.NtpTimestampDifference.Negate
member.summary: Changes the sign of the time difference (positive to negative and vice-versa).
member.returns: A time difference with the same absolute value as this instance and an opposite sign.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.NtpTimestampDifference.op_Equality(Rebex.Net.NtpTimestampDifference,Rebex.Net.NtpTimestampDifference)
member.summary: Compare two instances of NtpTimestampDifference.
member.returns: True if equal; false if not equal.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.NtpTimestampDifference.op_Inequality(Rebex.Net.NtpTimestampDifference,Rebex.Net.NtpTimestampDifference)
member.summary: Compare two instances of NtpTimestampDifference.
member.returns: Flase if equal; true if not equal.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.NtpTimestampDifference.op_LessThan(Rebex.Net.NtpTimestampDifference,Rebex.Net.NtpTimestampDifference)
member.summary: Indicates whether a specified NtpTimestampDifference is less than another specified NtpTimestampDifference.
member.returns: true if the value of a is less than the value of b; otherwise false.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.NtpTimestampDifference.op_GreaterThan(Rebex.Net.NtpTimestampDifference,Rebex.Net.NtpTimestampDifference)
member.summary: Indicates whether a specified NtpTimestampDifference is greater than another specified NtpTimestampDifference.
member.returns: true if the value of a is greater than the value of b; otherwise false.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.NtpTimestampDifference.op_LessThanOrEqual(Rebex.Net.NtpTimestampDifference,Rebex.Net.NtpTimestampDifference)
member.summary: Indicates whether a specified NtpTimestampDifference is less than or equal to another specified NtpTimestampDifference.
member.returns: true if the value of a is less than or equal to the value of b; otherwise false.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.NtpTimestampDifference.op_GreaterThanOrEqual(Rebex.Net.NtpTimestampDifference,Rebex.Net.NtpTimestampDifference)
member.summary: Indicates whether a specified NtpTimestampDifference is greater than or equal to another specified NtpTimestampDifference.
member.returns: true if the value of a is greater than or equal to the value of b; otherwise false.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.NtpTimestampDifference.op_Addition(Rebex.Net.NtpTimestampDifference,Rebex.Net.NtpTimestampDifference)
member.summary: Adds a time difference to a timestamp.
member.returns: A timestamp plus a time difference.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.NtpTimestampDifference.op_Subtraction(Rebex.Net.NtpTimestampDifference,Rebex.Net.NtpTimestampDifference)
member.summary: Subtracts a time difference from a timestamp.
member.returns: A timestamp minus a time difference.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.NtpTimestampDifference.Add(Rebex.Net.NtpTimestampDifference)
member.summary: Adds the specified time difference to this instance.
member.returns: A time difference plus a time difference.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.NtpTimestampDifference.Subtract(Rebex.Net.NtpTimestampDifference)
member.summary: Subtracts the specified time difference from this instance.
member.returns: A time difference plus a time difference.

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.NtpTimestampDifference.Positive
member.summary: Accessor for the sign of the time difference.
member.value: True for positive differences and zero; false for negative differences.

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.NtpTimestampDifference.TotalSeconds
member.summary: Gets the value of this instance expressed in whole and fractional seconds.
member.remarks: The value of this instance expressed in whole and fractional seconds.

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.NtpTimestampDifference.Microsecond
member.summary: The sub-second part of the time difference, on microsecond scale.

member.name: T:Rebex.Net.Time
member.summary: Provides methods for communication with TIME servers (RFC 868).

member.name: F:Rebex.Net.Time.DefaultPort
member.summary: Default TIME port number (37).

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.Time.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Creates an instance of class and binds it to the specified TIME server.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.Time.#ctor(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Creates an instance of class and binds it to the specified TIME server.

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.Time.UseTcp
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to use the TCP protocol (default is UDP).
member.value: True to use TCP; false to use UDP. Default is false.
